title: Face in Clouds
description:
A face that appears surrounded by clouds or a haze of smoke. Ambiguous in appearance, this may represent a foggy state of mind, confusion, or even a sense of calm bliss.

May also be used to indicate the presence of smoke.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the face in clouds emoji presents a serene, almost ethereal countenance peeking through soft, billowing white clouds. Apple‚Äôs signature glossy 3D shading and gentle gradients create a dreamlike atmosphere, suggesting a state of blissful distraction or a moment of profound thought. This emoji is perfectly rendered on Apple devices to convey feelings of being lost in thought, daydreaming, or experiencing a moment of pure, unadulterated peace.
